metadata.title: Only Resentments About the End of Life Remain

tracks.text: Muscular legs walk forward. Twin green blades dangle to side. The thighs bear large, dark scars.
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, twirls a spear in a forest.
Katzo, a girl with blond pig tails, walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
Psyger-0, a large knight, swings a weapon. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by her human form.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
Orcelot wears armor and a purple cape. He sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, Katzo fires energy blasts at goblins. Pencilgon strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
Pencilgon strikes with a sword. Katzo punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large temple rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into the bird man's red eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, Katzo, Sunraku, and Pencilgon walk side by side.
Text, 13, Only Resentments About the End of Life Remain
Pencilgon, Sunraku, and Katzo walk through a forest, with glowing dots of light and purple flowers hugging roots dotted with mushrooms.
Bees and Papillons fly around
Text, Prismatic Forest Grotto
She walks up to a shadowy part in the moss
She puts her hand on the spot
The wall crumbles
A light at the end of the earthen cave
Red spider lillies sway
Petals float above the vast field of red spider lillies
At the center of the field stands a barren, gnarled tree. The field is surrounded on all sides by high cliffs. The full moon hangs high in the sky
The translucent woman sits on the roots and sings.
Text, NPC, Setsuna of Bygone Days
When the souls of the Divinity are shaken, a rabbit shall tell an epic tale.
Setsuna's expression becomes blank
Setsuna looks up
Dialog, Unique Scenario EX, From the Living World, With Love. Begin Now?
Sunraku and Katzo exchange glances
They both press Yes. Dialog reads, "Begun."
Katzo, Emul, and Sunraku stare. Pencilgon smiles.
She looks at her hand, walks to the tree, and places her hand on the trunk.
The night sky turns photo negative
Setsuna turns back
She bows
The breeze blows her hair
Her eye twitches
She equips a spear. Explosion. Sunraku, Katzo, and Emul blast off like Team Rocket.
Setsuna smiles
The 3 like on the ground, stomachs bared, limbs up. Text, Submission pose.
The players join fists in a circle
Emul smiles from the ground.
Setsuna watches from a distance, then turns and looks up at the tree.
Above the red aura of the spider lillies, the tree reaches up, branches splintered, twigs bare, stretching up to the cold, starry sky and distant moon.
The players watch Setsuna
In the breeze, red petals float up from the field and float across the shining moon.
Rakuro's house
An egg is cracked into a pan
Text, Rakuro's Mother, Eika Hizutome, Entomology geek
A rhinoceros beetle
Text, Rakuro's Younger Sister, Rumi Hizutome, Fashionista
She looks at a fashion magazine. Rakuro notices a feature on Towa Amane
He holds a fish the size of his torso. Text, Rakuro's Father, Senji Hizutome, Likes fishing more than 3 meals a day
Sunraku spawns into a gray, post-apocalyptic urban street surrounded by crumbling skyscrapers.
Dragonfly runs forward
He punches the ground, causing an explosion
His leg is stretched left
He retracts his foot
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, Psyger-0, a knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
Katzo looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
Katzo crouches on an outcropping in front of the moon
Sunraku and Psyger-0 stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Rei's house
Rei sits in a room, her eyes closed.
She opens her eyes and picks up a calligraphy brush
She dips the brush in ink
She crumples the paper and adds it to the overflowing trash can.
She picks up the brush
Text, 18, Various Christmases
Rakuro's smiling face is printed on a strawberry short cake
Rei faceplants into the Rakuro face cake
